author: Darrell Etherington
title: Emergent BioSolutions gets $14.5M in federal funding to expedite COVID-19 plasma therapy development
description: Last week, we spoke to the Head of Emergent BioSolutions’ Therapeutics Business Unit Dr. Laura Saward about her company’s work developing plasma-based potential treatments for COVID-19. Now, the company announced that it has received $14.5 million in funding …
